attributes.additional_details: I am calling for a full independant enquiry into the lack of efficiency of wind power which has become a black hole for taxpayers money and keeps energy prices falsely high for the poorer consumers. Green energy is one of the biggest cons of the century. There has been no proof to date of the requirement for any renewables, and as renewables go wind is the most inefficient, unsightly, unrelaible and expensive form of sporadic power ever.Volume for volume water has 100 times more force than wind.
